parameter.value: Take all the time you need to decide what you want!
Welcome, welcome! Have a seat! If you like a drink or something to eat, just ask me for a {trade}!
I hate that name, it sounds so boring. Almost like 'normal'. I think I should change my name to something more exciting. Like... Marylin! Oh, what a glamorous sound!
Sorry, but I don't have time for that right now. There's some serious partying to do!
Oh, would you like something to eat or drink? Ask me for a {trade} to see my offers!
